name: Plan Your Business
description: Have a strong business plan in place to make later decisions and filings easier and more predictable.

name: Make a Few Decisions
description: Research the timeline and costs associated with the specifics of starting your business to prevent delays and unexpected costs.

name: Register and Form Your Business
description: Get legally recognized by the State and federal government so you can start acting on behalf of your business.

name: After Registering Your Business
description: Enter insurance and/or location agreements in your business’ name to protect both you and your business legally.

name: Before Opening Your Site
description: Obtain industry-specific approvals or inspections to make sure you’re in compliance with State or local laws before opening.
